content:
note hook sizes in the notes below they are given in metric numeric and letter sizes
from the designer > pablito was the first pattern i posted > in etsy hope you have fun > crocheting lots of little penguins **materials ** -------------- - little amounts of black and orange worsted weight yarn - a little piece of white felt - blue and black embroidery floss tapestry needle - size i/9 2 5 mm and f/5 4 mm crochet hooks - fiberfill or stuffing of your choice
